label: Engineer
description: A professional who applies technical knowledge and skills in engineering practice, bound by ethical standards and professional obligations

label: Public Safety
description: The paramount principle that engineers must prioritize the safety, health, and welfare of the public above all other considerations

label: Competence
description: The principle that engineers should only perform services in areas where they have sufficient knowledge, skills, and expertise

label: Honesty and Integrity
description: The principle that engineers must be truthful and objective in all professional communications and activities

label: Professional Development
description: The principle that engineers should continuously improve their knowledge and skills throughout their careers

label: Truthful Reporting
description: The obligation to provide objective and truthful information in all professional reports, statements, and testimony

label: Confidentiality
description: The obligation to protect and not disclose confidential information without proper consent

label: Conflict of Interest Disclosure
description: The obligation to disclose any known or potential conflicts of interest that might affect professional judgment

label: Compensation Transparency
description: The obligation to disclose when receiving compensation from multiple parties for the same service

label: Professional Honor
description: The obligation to uphold the honor and dignity of the engineering profession through ethical conduct

label: Public Statement
description: A formal communication made by an engineer to the public or stakeholders that must be objective and truthful

label: Professional Service
description: Work performed by an engineer that requires technical competence and adherence to ethical standards

label: Technical Competence
description: The capability to perform engineering work with adequate knowledge, skills, and judgment in a specific domain

label: Ethical Judgment
description: The capability to recognize ethical issues and make decisions that align with professional principles and obligations

label: Professional Code
description: A formal document that establishes ethical standards and guidelines for professional conduct
